metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Interactive forms : These contain fields that you can select and fill in.
Enhanced productivity : Work across multiple PDFs and documents in various formats,

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • Flat forms : These do  not have interactive fields. It could be a paper form or PDF that • hasn’t been optimized for form filling. The Fill & Sign tool automatically detects the form fields like text fields, comb fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons. You can manually add text and other symbols anywhere on the form using the Fill & Sign tool if required. You can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signatures. Acrobat also allows you to send your completed forms to others and securely save them in Adobe cloud storage.
You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types

An  interactive  form contains fields that you can select or fill in. 1. If necessary, select either the  Hand Tool  or the  Select Tool  from the context menu of the page (right-click on the page to open the context menu). The pointer changes to a different icon as you move it over a field. For example, the  Hand tool changes to an I-beam  when you can type text into the form field. Some text fields are dynamic, meaning that they automatically resize to accommodate the amount of data you enter and can span across pages. 2. Select anywhere in the form to access options, such as radio buttons. Select inside a text field to type. Press Tab to move forward or Shift+Tab to move backward. 3. When finished, submit the form to either send the data to a server or create an email to send the data.

Not all forms are fillable. Sometimes form creators don’t convert their PDFs to interactive  fillable  forms. Or, they intentionally design a form that you can fill in only by hand or with the  Fill & Sign  tool. These non-interactive forms are called  flat  forms.
including Teams and Zoom meeting transcripts, streamlining your workflow and saving time for higher-priority tasks. -
